title: Canyon Endurace CF SLX review: It turns out that smooth is fast
content:
The Canyon Endurace offers a novel adjustable handlebar, more aero, and excellent comfort. Aside from one hiccup it is hard to find a better endurance road bike.

Read the full article at Canyon Endurace CF SLX review: It turns out that smooth is fast on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
